item.title: 内战加剧，苏丹重要港口遭爆炸袭击
item.description: 周二，苏丹主要沿海城市的机场和港口发生爆炸，这是两年来北非国家军队与快速支援部队民兵之间冲突的最新升级。【原文：Explosions rocked the airport and port at Sudan’s main coastal city on Tuesday, the latest escalation in two years of conflict between the North African nation’s army and the Rapid Support Forces militia.】

item.title: 尽管 "全球不确定性 "存在，维斯塔斯仍维持盈利预测
item.description: 维斯塔斯风能系统公司（Vestas Wind Systems A/S）在经历了近几年的严重亏损后，继续执行扭亏为盈计划，维持了今年的利润指导。【原文：Vestas Wind Systems A/S maintained its profit guidance for this year as the company continues to execute on a turnaround plan after steep losses in recent years.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：壳牌盯上英国石油公司，英国股市再迎涨势
大陆集团第一季度销售额创四年来最佳纪录
item.description: 由于汽车零部件部门削减了成本，轮胎销售从去年的疲软水平反弹，大陆集团第一季度的盈利增长了一倍多。【原文：Continental AG more than doubled its earnings in the first quarter as its car-parts unit slashed costs and tire sales bounced back from weaker levels last year.】

item.title: 飞利浦因中美贸易紧张局势下调利润率指引
item.description: 荷兰皇家飞利浦公司下调了本年度的盈利预期，原因是应对不断上升的贸易障碍所需的成本。【原文：Royal Philips NV lowered its profitability outlook for the year due to the cost of dealing with rising trade hurdles.】

item.title: 关税迫使英格兰银行考虑加快减税步伐
item.description: 作为对美国全球贸易战的回应，英格兰银行本周将把利率下调四分之一个点，甚至可能为 2009 年以来首次连续降息铺平道路。【原文：The Bank of England is set to cut interest rates by a quarter point this week and may even pave the way for a series of back-to-back reductions for the first time since 2009 as it responds to America’s global trade war.】

item.title: 前安赛乐米塔尔交易商为最新基金寻求 10 亿美元投资
item.description: 由前 ArcelorMittal SA 高管 Sudhir Maheshwari 创办的 Synergy Capital 希望在明年之前为其最新基金募集 10 亿美元，该基金重点关注亚洲，尤其是印度的私人信贷。【原文：Synergy Capital, founded by former ArcelorMittal SA executive Sudhir Maheshwari, is looking to raise $1 billion by next year for its latest fund that focuses on private credit in Asia, particularly in India.】

item.title: 微软扩大与斯德哥尔摩运动会的碳清除协议
item.description: 微软公司扩大了从热电厂运营商斯德哥尔摩 Exergi AB 公司购买碳减排信用额度的交易，将去年首次达成的交易量增加了 50%以上。【原文：Microsoft Corp. expanded its deal to buy carbon removal credits from heat-plant operator Stockholm Exergi AB, increasing volumes first agreed last year by more than 50%.】

item.title: 瑞典银行认为瑞典央行今年将再降息两次
item.description: 瑞典银行（Swedbank AB）的分析师目前预计，瑞典央行将在第三季度结束前两次下调关键利率，降至 1.75%，并称较低的通胀率将使决策者能够扶持依然低迷的经济。【原文：Analysts at Swedbank AB now expect the Riksbank to cut its key interest rate twice by the end of the third quarter, to 1.75%, saying that lower inflation would allow policymakers to bolster the still-sluggish economy.】

item.title: 韩国将于本周与捷克签署核协议
item.description: 首尔工业部在一份声明中说，由韩国水电与核电公司牵头的一个韩国集团将于本周签署一项最终协议，在捷克共和国的 Dukovany 综合体建造两座核反应堆。【原文：A South Korean group, led by Korea Hydro & Nuclear Power Co., will sign a final agreement to build two nuclear reactors at the Dukovany complex in the Czech Republic this week, Seoul’s industry ministry said in a statement.】

item.title: 摩根大通和美国银行不顾美国众议院反对坚持 CATL 交易
item.description: 尽管美国国会委员会呼吁美国贷款机构退出交易，摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）和美国银行公司（Bank of America Corp.尽管美国国会的一个委员会要求这两家美国贷款机构退出该交易，但摩根大通和美国银行仍继续为 Contemporary Amperex Technology Co.【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. and Bank of America Corp. have forged ahead working on the blockbuster listing of Contemporary Amperex Technology Co. Ltd. despite a US congressional committee calling for the American lenders to drop out of the deal.】

item.title: 上海黄金交易所将仓库网络扩展至香港
item.description: 上海黄金交易所计划将其仓储网络扩展到香港，以帮助其人民币计价产品（包括贵金属）在中国大陆以外的地区提升知名度。【原文：The Shanghai Gold Exchange plans to expand its warehouse network to Hong Kong, helping to raise the profile of its yuan-denominated products, including for the precious metal, beyond mainland China.】

item.title: 尽管美国加征关税，中国四月底贸易额仍保持稳定
item.description: 中国的贸易流量在 4 月底有所增加，这表明美国关税造成的损害尚未体现在实际出货量上，尽管人们普遍预计贸易战最终会拖累这个世界第二大经济体。【原文：China’s trade flows increased at the end of April, indicating the damage from US tariffs has yet to manifest in actual shipments even though the trade war is widely expected to eventually slow the world’s second-largest economy.】

item.title: 联合国发现：发展中国家有望很快提高人工智能生产力
item.description: 联合国发现，发展中国家的大多数人预计人工智能将在明年提高生产力，新技术有可能帮助应对人类发展 "前所未有的放缓"。【原文：Most people in the developing world expect artificial intelligence to boost productivity over the next year, the United Nations found, with new technologies potentially helping to counter an “unprecedented slowdown” in human development.】

item.title: Clearlake 寻求将信贷部门的资产增加两倍，达到 1000 亿美元
item.description: Clearlake Capital Group 正致力于将其信贷业务增加两倍，并将成立一个部门，帮助这家收购公司从蓬勃发展的资产类别中分得更大一杯羹。【原文：Clearlake Capital Group is aiming to triple its credit business with the launch of a unit to help the buyout firm grab a bigger slice of the booming asset class.】

item.title: 据说华尔街银行对奇瑞 15 亿美元的香港 IPO 避而远之
item.description: 在没有华尔街银行参与的情况下，今年最大的上市项目之一正在香港进行。【原文：One of this year’s biggest listings is coming together in Hong Kong without the involvement of Wall Street banks.】

item.title: 泰国通胀率转为负值将有助于进一步降息
item.description: 由于燃料价格下降和新鲜食品供应增加，泰国的通货膨胀率一年多来首次转为负值，这为央行进一步降低利率以应对贸易战的影响创造了更大的空间。【原文：Thailand’s inflation turned negative for the first time in more than a year on cheaper fuel prices and increased fresh food supplies, creating more room for the central bank to cut rates further to deal with the impact of the trade war.】

item.title: 电动摩托车制造商 Ather 在印度首次公开募股（IPO）复兴之际首次亮相备受关注
item.description: 阿瑟能源有限公司（Ather Energy Ltd. ）的股票将于周二开始在印度证券交易所上市交易，这是印度本财年首次大规模首次公开募股，将为股票资本市场复苏的可能性提供线索。【原文：Ather Energy Ltd.’s shares will start trading on Indian bourses Tuesday, in the nation’s first major initial public offering this fiscal year that will provide clues on the likelihood of equity capital market revival.】

item.title: 印度股市的反弹将从盈利中得到提振
item.description: 由于投资者对衍生品的兴趣日益浓厚，分析师预计该公司的季度利润将增长两倍。【原文：BSE Ltd.’s recent share rally may get another boost from its upcoming earnings, with analysts expecting quarterly profits to triple thanks to growing investor interest in derivatives.】

item.title: 马来西亚出口商对林吉特的担忧在减少
item.description: 据一位部长称，在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统上调关税之前，企业争相提前装运货物，因此林吉特最近的反弹对马来西亚的出口影响不大。【原文：The ringgit’s recent rally will have little impact on Malaysia’s exports as companies scramble to front-load shipments ahead of President Donald Trump’s tariff hikes, according to a minister.】

item.title: 据说 SMFG 正在洽谈购买印度 Yes 银行的少数股权
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，日本第二大银行三井住友金融集团正在洽谈收购印度 Yes Bank Ltd. 的少数股权。【原文：Sumitomo Mitsui Financial Group Inc., Japan’s second-biggest lender, is in talks to buy a significant minority stake in India’s Yes Bank Ltd., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中东巨头退出人工智能模型竞赛，美国和中国占据主导地位
item.description: 在 ChatGPT 于 2022 年底发布后的几个月内，阿拉伯联合酋长国的研究实验室声称已经开发出了可靠的竞争对手。名列前茅的是猎鹰（Falcon）和杰伊斯（Jais），前者是在政府支持下开发的一款流行的开源人工智能系统，后者则以该国最高的山峰命名。【原文：Within months of ChatGPT’s release in late 2022, research labs in the United Arab Emirates claimed to have developed credible rivals. At the top of the list was Falcon, a popular open-source artificial intelligence system built with government support, and Jais, a model named for the country’s highest mountain peak.】

item.title: 中国 CATL 为印尼工厂扩建寻求 10 亿美元贷款
item.description: 当代 Amperex Technology Co.据熟悉内情的人士透露，世界顶级电动汽车电池制造商安培雷斯科技有限公司正在寻求约 10 亿美元的贷款，用于在印度尼西亚的投资。【原文：Contemporary Amperex Technology Co. Ltd., the world’s top maker of electric vehicle batteries, is seeking a loan of about $1 billion to fund an investment in Indonesia, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国要求强制出售谷歌广告技术产品
item.description: 美国司法部表示，Alphabet 公司旗下的谷歌公司应被迫出售其帮助网站购买、销售和提供在线广告服务的两项业务，因为法官发现该公司非法垄断了这些市场。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google should be forced to sell off two of its businesses that help websites buy, sell and serve online advertising after a judge found the company illegally monopolized those markets, the Justice Department said.】

item.title: 如果美印协议公布，"五月抛售 "本地股将受到限制
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 对冲基金 Regal 称生物技术暴跌未引发赎回
item.description: Regal Partners Ltd. 联合创始人菲尔-金（Phil King）说，他已经从公司对 Opthea Ltd. 的错误投资中吸取了教训。【原文：Regal Partners Ltd. co-founder Phil King says he’s learned from mistakes made in the firm’s Opthea Ltd. investment that went awry.】

item.title: 中国塑料制造商面临因美国打压而失去伊朗供应的风险
item.description: 在美国威胁对伊朗石油买家实施二级制裁之后，伊朗对中国的甲醇出口可能会受到审查。【原文：Iranian methanol exports to China — which have so far flown under Washington’s radar — may be subject to scrutiny after the US threatened to impose secondary sanctions on buyers of the country’s oil.】

item.title: 中国股市休市后上涨，交易员评估美国会谈和数据
item.description: 中国股市在结束为期五天的假期后走高，投资者在关注与美国贸易谈判取得进展的迹象的同时，也在评估一系列国内消费数据。【原文：Chinese stocks edged higher on their return from a five-day holiday, with investors watching signs of progress in trade talks with the US while assessing a host of domestic consumption data.】

item.title: 中国服务业活动令人失望，经济再遭重创
item.description: 一项民间调查显示，中国 4 月份服务业活动的恶化程度超出预期，这是已受到美国关税压力的中国经济遭遇的最新挫折。【原文：China’s services activity deteriorated more than expected in April, a private survey showed, the latest setback for an economy already under pressure from US tariffs.】

item.title: 澳大利亚家庭支出因飓风袭击意外下降
item.description: 澳大利亚 3 月份的家庭支出意外下降，结束了连续 5 个月的增长势头，原因是该国东北部的一场大风暴扰乱了经济活动。【原文：Australia’s household spending unexpectedly declined in March, snapping five months of increases as the impact of a major storm in the nation’s northeast disrupted activity.】
